title: Best of the Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Michael Malice | 4/1/22
description:
Glenn has a new favorite breakfast cereal: "Weenies: The Breakfast of Champions"? Bill O’Reilly warns of the "unintended consequences" of the Democrats’ gender agenda and reviews the latest Hunter Biden news. "The Anarchist Handbook" author Michael Malice lays out why Florida’s new financial literacy bill is so important.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
